title: Wicked Little Sins
description: Everyone sins.But some sins are wicked.Everly, Charley ,Quinn and Ethan are siblings. And they were a happy family before their motherâ€™s murder. Everly is a musician, Charley a big time publisher, Quinn is still struggling to find herself while working a waitressing job. And Ethan, the baby of the family is in college hating every minute of it. The one person that understood them was their mother. But when a shocking revelation makes their mother looks less than perfect her skeletons come out to get them. And there might not be anything they can do about it.
author: Holly Hood
